title.narrative: OUTP 5.1: EDUC FOR EXCLUDED & OUT OF SCH

description.narrative: Output 5.1: Enhanced communities and stakeholders' capacities at all levels (MoPSE and education partners) for increased learning opportunities and equitable access and retention of disadvantaged, excluded and out-of-school children (boys and girls)., which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: Improved and more equitable access to and completion of quality, inclusive education with improved learning outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
